name: The Apostle
description:
The Apostle is a game created for the Ludum Dare 43.

The theme was the jam was "Sacrifices must be made".

The game is a side scroller in which you will have to avoid lava and harvest holy water in order to unlock the holy gate which will send you on your way... if the RNGod allows it.
